title: Fish Stew

ingredients.content: ½ tsp smoked paprika, hot or sweet
500 g potatoes, peeled, cut in pieces (2-3 cm)
500 g fresh mussels, scrubbed and debearded
800 g gilthead bream, fillets, sliced (5 cm)
1 Tbsp fresh parsley, leaves only, roughly chopped

preparations.content: Place oil, onions, peppers and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Sauté <b>8 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add tomatoes, wine, stock, saffron, paprika and salt. Insert simmering basket and weigh in potatoes.
Place Varoma dish into position and weigh in mussels.
Insert Varoma tray and weigh fish pieces onto it. Cover Varoma then cook <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Meanwhile, warm a casserole dish in a low oven.

Remove Varoma. Remove simmering basket with aid of spatula. With measuring cup in place, blend <b>12 sec/speed 7<b>. Place fish in warmed casserole dish and add potatoes and mussels. Pour over sauce, sprinkle with parsley and serve.

hintsAndTricks: If using dried peppers, crush <b>6 sec/speed 7<b> before step 1.
